amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to revise language regarding borrow sites for coastal storm risk management projects within the Coastal Barrier Resources Act system.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouzer amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouzer amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouzer amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
